William Saroyan Epistolary Ego Network

About

This Website hosts a variety of data visualizations of playwright and short story author William Saroyan's epistolary correspondances with authors and literary critics.

You can find the source code for Minima at GitHub: jekyll / minima

You can find the source code for Jekyll at GitHub: jekyll / jekyll
